title: Ex-Employees of ConsenSys AG Launch Legal Battle Over Equity Dispute with Ethereum (ETH) Founder Joseph Lubin
description: Former employees of ConsenSys AG, a company founded by an Ethereum co-founder, file a lawsuit for breach of contract. Interestingly, the company’s spokesperson has stated that the said individuals are embarking on a fruitless journey.Â  27 former employees of ConsenSys AG have sued the founder, Joseph Lubin, for depriving them of their equity. title: New York AG Takes on Gemini, Genesis, and DCG: Alleged $1.100,000,000 Billion Crypto Loss Cover-Up
description: New York Attorney General Letitia James has sued Gemini, Genesis and DCG for defrauding investors. This lawsuit compounds the firms’ woes considering an earlier SEC suit filed against them over Gemini’s Earn product. New York State Attorney General (AG) Letitia James has accused Gemini, Genesis, and Digital Currency Group (DCG) of misleading and defrauding 230,000 [...]
